Title: The Reunion
Writer: Damiano Damiani (story), Damiano Damiani (screenplay), Ugo Liberatore (collaboration), Enrico Ribulsi (collaboration), Vittoriano Petrilli (collaboration)
Actors: Walter Chiari, Letícia Román, Francisco Rabal, Riccardo Garrone
Plot: Two members of a former group of friends find themselves after many years by chance through the streets of Milan; after a moment, memories of the past resurface.
